column6: Originally the manager's apartment in an historic 1937 movie theater, this 2nd floor walkup sits in the heart of downtown, an easy walk or bike ride to Conn Brown Harbor & Redfish Bay. 15 minutes from Rockport & Port Aransas art galleries and restaurants. This funky, eclectic space welcomes you with its unique unpretentious style. It's also very walkable, just 1/2 block from a major grocery store, restaurants, & galleries. Steps away is The Rialto Theater with plays & concerts all year long.
